title: Installation issue: mpip
body:
<!--*Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the
report please:*
1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively!
-->


### Spack version: 0.13.3

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install mpip ^intel-mpi@2019.5.281
```
I have compiled my software with the -g flag and linked with the needed libraries, -lmpiP -lm -lbfd -liberty -lunwind 

What I get as an output is the following header:
mpiP:
mpiP: mpiP: mpiP V3.4.1 (Build Mar 26 2020/13:54:52)
mpiP: Direct questions and errors to mpip-help@lists.sourceforge.net
mpiP:

No trailer is generated and no report is generated (I have tried setting the MPIP variable with various options but I get no output, note: a report should be generated with or without). I get no explicit warnings or errors of any sort in my logs or slurm output. I believe the error might be still related to the build and some of the dependencies versions. Sorry for taking your rime if that is not the case and this is not the right thread.

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux ip-172-31-15-68 4.4.0-1099-aws #110-Ubuntu SMP Fri Nov 15 00:08:08 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 16.04.6 LTS
``` 

### Additional information

```console
 Input spec
--------------------------------
mpip
    ^intel-mpi@2019.5.281

Concretized
--------------------------------
mpip@3.4.1%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
    ^elfutils@0.178%gcc@7.4.0~bzip2+nls~xz arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
        ^gettext@0.20.1%gcc@7.4.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
            ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@7.4.0+shared arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
                ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
                    ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
            ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@7.4.0~python arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
                ^pkgconf@1.6.3%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
                ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@7.4.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
            ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@7.4.0~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
            ^tar@1.32%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
        ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@7.4.0 patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
            ^libsigsegv@2.12%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
    ^intel-mpi@2019.5.281%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
    ^libdwarf@20180129%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake
    ^libunwind@1.2.1%gcc@7.4.0~xz arch=linux-ubuntu16.04-skylake

...
```
